short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a moving average and stock price data to your Google Trends charts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
Unlock the full potential of market analysis with TickerTrends, a powerful Chrome extension designed to seamlessly integrate real-time stock market data into Google Trends graphs. With TickerTrends, financial enthusiasts, traders, and market analysts can now overlay precise stock price information directly onto Google Trends data, providing a unique visual representation of how search interest correlates with market movements.

Key Features:

Real-Time Data Integration: View up-to-date stock market prices superimposed on Google Trends graphs for comprehensive analysis.
Seamless Browsing Experience: Enjoy native integration on the Google Trends website without switching tabs or using separate tools.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily add or remove stock data with just a few clicks directly within Google Trends.
Enhanced Market Insights: Discover hidden patterns and correlations between public interest in specific terms and the corresponding stock market reactions.

Benefits:

Make Informed Decisions: By viewing market data alongside search trends, you can make more informed decisions based on public interest trends and market performance.
Save Time: Streamline your research by accessing all the information you need in one place, reducing the need to juggle between tools.
Boost Your Analysis: Whether you're preparing a market forecast, researching for an investment, or simply satisfying your curiosity, TickerTrends provides you with a robust tool to enhance your analysis.

Easy to Install and Use:

Add the TickerTrends extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to the Google Trends website.
Start exploring trends with integrated stock market data.
Get TickerTrends today and start bridging the gap between market data and public interest, enhancing your strategies and insights with every search.
